# wexample-file

Package that allows you to manage the state of files and directories using YAML configuration files.

Version: 0.0.5

## Requirements

- Python >=3.10

## Dependencies

- pydantic>=2,<3
- wexample-helpers==0.0.66

## Installation

```bash
pip install wexample-file
```

## Links

- Homepage: https://github.com/wexample/python-file
